Senior Firmware Engineer at Pillar Technologies | Seed-stage | Full-time | New York | On-site | http://pillar.tech

- Deliver top quality firmware for real-time, battery-powered, embedded sensor as part of an IoT framework - Proficient in C/C++ - Strong background with microcontrollers (STM32, ARM), hardware design, firmware design, serial and wireless communications protocols (I2C, SPI, Wi-Fi, ZigBee, Bluetooth) - Experience with embedded platforms, from deeply embedded (limited memory, no RTOS) to embedded RTOS

Our goal is to bring intuitive products to the construction site, a legacy industry in need of smarter technology. To deliver on that mission of simple but effective technology, we've built a lean, results-oriented team dedicated to those goals. Your contribution will help to shape the core of the product, today and into the future.

If this sounds interesting or you have any questions, email us at jobs@pillar.tech.
